name: Jira Rocket.Chat Notifier
description: Receives Jira webhook notifications and automatically sends direct messages to relevant Rocket.Chat users (such as assignees, reporters, watchers, and custom participants) based on issue events. Supports admin-configurable user mapping and custom Jira user fields for flexible participant extraction.
documentationUrl: Setup your Jira project to use below link as webhook url. Check App Settings page in RocketChat for further configuration.
